metadata.title: CVE-2018-4117 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 11.3 isaffected. Safari before 11.1 is affected. iCloud before 7.4 on Windows isaffected. iTunes before 12.7.4 on Windows is affected. watchOS before 4.3is affected. The issue involves the fetch API in the "WebKit" component. Itallows remote attackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy and obtainsensitive information via a crafted web site.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4117` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.20.0-2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.20.0-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.20.0-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.20.0-2
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.20.0-2
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.20.0-2
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.20.0-2
No subscription required

chromium-browser - 68.0.3440.75-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 68.0.3440.75-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 68.0.3440.75-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 68.0.3440.75-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 68.0.3440.75-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.20.0-2').
qtwebkit-source package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '68.0.3440.75-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
